file.name: jira.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Jira
  description: The Jira app for creating and managing issues from shuffle workflow.
  version: "1.0"
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
  contact:
    email: dhavaldave055@gmail.com
    name: "@dhavaldave"
    url: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dhavaldave055
  x-categories:
    - Cases
servers:
  - url: ""
basePath: /
schemes:
  - ""
paths:
  "/rest/api/2/issue/{issue_id}":
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: ""
      summary: Get issue
      operationId: Get_issue
      description: Get issue by id
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: issue_id
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content: {}
  "/rest/api/3/attachment/{attachment_id}":
    delete:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: ""
      summary: Delete attachment
      operationId: Delete_attachment
      description: Delete attachment by id
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: attachment_id
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content: {}
  /rest/api/3/issue/picker:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                      "sections": [
                          {
                              "label": "History Search",
                              "sub": "Showing 3 of 3 matching issues",
                              "id": "hs",
                              "issues": [
                                  {
                                      "id": 10006,
                                      "key": "ST-7",
                                      "keyHtml": "ST-7",
                                      "img": "/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype",
                                      "summary": "<b>REST</b> <b>EXAMPL</b>E",
                                      "summaryText": "REST EXAMPLE"
                                  },
                                  {
                                      "id": 10004,
                                      "key": "ST-5",
                                      "keyHtml": "ST-5",
                                      "img": "/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype",
                                      "summary": "<b>REST</b> <b>EXAMPL</b>E",
                                      "summaryText": "REST EXAMPLE"
                                  },
                                  {
                                      "id": 10002,
                                      "key": "ST-3",
                                      "keyHtml": "ST-3",
                                      "img": "/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype",
                                      "summary": "<b>REST</b> <b>EXAMPL</b>E",
                                      "summaryText": "REST EXAMPLE"
                                  }
                              ]
                          }
                      ]
                  }
      summary: Search issues
      operationId: Search_issues
      description: Search for issues
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: query
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content: {}
  "/rest/api/3/issue/{Issue_id}/comment":
    post:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                    "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/10010/comment/10000",
                    "id": "10000",
                    "author": {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                      "active": false
                    },
                    "body": {
                      "type": "doc",
                      "version": 1,
                      "content": [
                        {
                          "type": "paragraph",
                          "content": [
                            {
                              "type": "text",
                              "text": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque eget venenatis elit. Duis eu justo eget augue iaculis fermentum. Sed semper quam laoreet nisi egestas at posuere augue semper."
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    "updateAuthor": {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                      "active": false
                    },
                    "created": "2021-03-01T03:38:14.137+0000",
                    "updated": "2021-03-01T03:38:14.137+0000",
                    "visibility": {
                      "type": "role",
                      "value": "Administrators"
                    }
                  }
      summary: Add comment on issue
      operationId: Add_comment_on_issue
      description: "Add text comment "
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: Issue_id
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: body
          name: body
          multiline: true
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: |-
            {
              "body": {
                "type": "doc",
                "version": 1,
                "content": [
                  {
                    "type": "paragraph",
                    "content": [
                      {
                        "text": "${comment}",
                        "type": "text"
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: header
          name: Content-Type
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: application/json
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: header
          name: "Accept "
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: application/json
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
        content:
          example:
            example: |-
              {
                "body": {
                  "type": "doc",
                  "version": 1,
                  "content": [
                    {
                      "type": "paragraph",
                      "content": [
                        {
                          "text": "${comment}",
                          "type": "text"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              }
  "/rest/api/3/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/comment/{comment_id}":
    delete:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: ""
      summary: Delete comment
      operationId: Delete_comment
      description: Deletes a comment
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: issueIdOrKey
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: comment_id
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content: {}
  "/rest/api/3/issue/{issueId_Or_Key}/comment":
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                    "startAt": 0,
                    "maxResults": 1,
                    "total": 1,
                    "comments": [
                      {
                        "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/10010/comment/10000",
                        "id": "10000",
                        "author": {
                          "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                          "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                          "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                          "active": false
                        },
                        "body": {
                          "type": "doc",
                          "version": 1,
                          "content": [
                            {
                              "type": "paragraph",
                              "content": [
                                {
                                  "type": "text",
                                  "text": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque eget venenatis elit. Duis eu justo eget augue iaculis fermentum. Sed semper quam laoreet nisi egestas at posuere augue semper."
                                }
                              ]
                            }
                          ]
                        },
                        "updateAuthor": {
                          "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                          "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                          "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                          "active": false
                        },
                        "created": "2021-03-02T06:59:24.855+0000",
                        "updated": "2021-03-02T06:59:24.855+0000",
                        "visibility": {
                          "type": "role",
                          "value": "Administrators"
                        }
                      }
                    ]
                  }
      summary: Get comments
      operationId: Get_comments
      description: Returns all comments for an issue
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: issueId_Or_Key
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: header
          name: Accept
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: application/json
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content: {}
  "/rest/api/3/issue/{issueId_or_Key}/comment/{comment_id}":
    put:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                    "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/10010/comment/10000",
                    "id": "10000",
                    "author": {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                      "active": false
                    },
                    "body": {
                      "type": "doc",
                      "version": 1,
                      "content": [
                        {
                          "type": "paragraph",
                          "content": [
                            {
                              "type": "text",
                              "text": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque eget venenatis elit. Duis eu justo eget augue iaculis fermentum. Sed semper quam laoreet nisi egestas at posuere augue semper."
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    "updateAuthor": {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                      "active": false
                    },
                    "created": "2021-03-02T06:59:24.855+0000",
                    "updated": "2021-03-02T06:59:24.855+0000",
                    "visibility": {
                      "type": "role",
                      "value": "Administrators"
                    }
                  }
      summary: Update comment
      operationId: Update_comment
      description: Updates a comment
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: issueId_or_Key
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: comment_id
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: body
          name: body
          multiline: true
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: |-
            {
              "body": {
                "type": "doc",
                "version": 1,
                "content": [
                  {
                    "type": "paragraph",
                    "content": [
                      {
                        "text": "${comment}",
                        "type": "text"
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: header
          name: Accept
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: application/json
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: header
          name: Content-Type
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: application/json
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
        content:
          example:
            example: |-
              {
                "body": {
                  "type": "doc",
                  "version": 1,
                  "content": [
                    {
                      "type": "paragraph",
                      "content": [
                        {
                          "text": "${comment}",
                          "type": "text"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              }
  "/rest/api/3/project/{projectIdOrKey}":
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                    "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/project/EX",
                    "id": "10000",
                    "key": "EX",
                    "description": "This project was created as an example for REST.",
                    "lead": {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "key": "",
                      "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                      "name": "",
                      "avatarUrls": {

                        "16x16": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=16&s=16",
                        "32x32": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=32&s=32"
                      },
                      "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                      "active": false
                    },
                    "components": [
                      {

                          "name": "",
                          "avatarUrls": {
                            "48x48": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=48&s=48",
                            "24x24": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=24&s=24",
                            "16x16": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=16&s=16",
                            "32x32": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=32&s=32"

                          "key": "",
                          "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                          "name": "",
                          "avatarUrls": {
                            "48x48": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=48&s=48",
                            "24x24": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=24&s=24",
                            "16x16": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=16&s=16",
                            "32x32": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=32&s=32"
                          },
                          "displayName": "Mia Krystof",

                          "name": "",

                            "24x24": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=24&s=24",
                            "16x16": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=16&s=16",

      summary: Get project
      operationId: Get_project

      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: projectIdOrKey
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: true

            type: string
        - in: header
          name: Accept
          multiline: false
          description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false

  /rest/api/latest/issue:
    post:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  {
                    "id": "10000",
                    "key": "ED-24",
                    "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/issue/10000",
                    "transition": {
                      "status": 200,
                      "errorCollection": {
                        "errorMessages": [],
                        "errors": {}
                      }
                    }
                  }
      summary: Create issue
      operationId: Create_issue
      description: Creates an issue in jira
      parameters:
        - in: body
          name: body
          multiline: true
          description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
          required: false
          example: >-
            {
                "fields": {
                   "project":
                   {
                      "key": "TEST"
                   },
                   "summary": "REST ye merry gentlemen.",
                   "description": "Creating of an issue using project keys and issue type names using the REST API",
                   "issuetype": {
                      "name": "Bug"
                   }
               }
            }
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
        content:
          example:
            example: >-
              {
                  "fields": {
                     "project":
                     {
                        "key": "TEST"
                     },
                     "summary": "REST ye merry gentlemen.",
                     "description": "Creating of an issue using project keys and issue type names using the REST API",
                     "issuetype": {
                        "name": "Bug"
                     }
                 }
              }
  "/rest/api/latest/issue/{issue_key}/attachments":
    post:
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: >-
                  [
                    {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachments/10000",
                      "id": "10001",
                      "filename": "picture.jpg",
                      "author": {
                        "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                        "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                        "emailAddress": "mia@example.com",
                        "avatarUrls": {
                          "48x48": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=48&s=48",
                          "24x24": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=24&s=24",
                          "16x16": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=16&s=16",
                          "32x32": "https://avatar-management--avatars.server-location.prod.public.atl-paas.net/initials/MK-5.png?size=32&s=32"
                        },
                        "displayName": "Mia Krystof",
                        "active": true,
                        "timeZone": "Australia/Sydney"
                      },
                      "created": "2021-02-26T01:45:06.311+0000",
                      "size": 23123,
                      "mimeType": "image/jpeg",
                      "content": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/secure/attachments/10000/picture.jpg",
                      "thumbnail": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/secure/thumbnail/10000/picture.jpg"
                    },
                    {
                      "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/attachments/10001",
                      "filename": "dbeuglog.txt",
                      "author": {
                        "self": "https://your-domain.atlassian.net/rest/api/3/user?accountId=5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                        "accountId": "5b10a2844c20165700ede21g",
                        "emailAddress": "mia@example.com",
